Hello Iowiekuipers

I dont want to install all the files contained in Map 0 to Map 25, so I'll erase some of them. However it seems to me, that the Map 18 is necessary (contains device settings according to your "Installatiehandleleiding"). The problem is: Map 18 with its files are not present in the download. Can I still go ahead with the installation and expect the device (GoPal 5) to work?
Hoi Lowie, werkt perfect, dank je wel !!!
